com.charlie.Graphics.engine

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.charlie.Graphics.engine.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Vertex is a structure representing a vertex with x,y,z, and w components. If a programmer wanted to add color data or normal data or something simillar to their verts then they would extend this class
    Author:
    Charlie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix getMatrixAsColumnOrder()
      get a matrix representing this vertex using Column-Major ordering
      void homogeneousDivide()
      This takes the vertex and divides the first n-1 elements and divides them by the nth element (ie it devides x, y, and z by w) Basically this makes it so things like projections that change the w value of the Homogeneous representation of the point actually work
      void setFromMatrixUsingColumnOrder(Matrix m)

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getMatrixAsColumnOrder

        public Matrix getMatrixAsColumnOrder()
        get a matrix representing this vertex using Column-Major ordering
        Returns:
        matrix repersenting this vertex

      • homogeneousDivide

        public void homogeneousDivide()
        This takes the vertex and divides the first n-1 elements and divides them by the nth element (ie it devides x, y, and z by w) Basically this makes it so things like projections that change the w value of the Homogeneous representation of the point actually work
